key.name:
<FONT color='#FFD200' size='15' >Select the next item</FONT>
<FONT size='3'> </FONT>
<FONT color='#909090'>Key is pressed, the currently selected item
Select the next item.

<FONT color='#FFD200' size='15' >One comment</FONT>
<FONT size='3'> </FONT>
<FONT color='#909090'>Cursor up.
Moves the cursor to the item on the top bunk can be installed by.

<FONT color='#FFD200' size='15' >To recall</FONT>
<FONT size='3'> </FONT>
<FONT color='#909090'>The recovered items will be moved to your belongings in. 
The position of the cursor in the item.
You can reclaim the items in my possession.</FONT>

<FONT color='#FFD200' size='15' >To rotate</FONT>
<FONT size='3'> </FONT>
<FONT color='#909090'>You can turn the direction of the item, which is placed.
The item is rotated in the position of the cursor.
You can rotate the items after the placement

<FONT color='#FFD200' size='15' >One down</FONT>
<FONT size='3'> </FONT>
<FONT color='#909090'>Moves the cursor to the lower one.
Gets the cursor can be replaced, even the bottom onto the floor.

<FONT color='#FFD200' size='15' >To be placed</FONT>
<FONT size='3'> </FONT>
<FONT color='#909090'>Holding the item.
The location of the cursor is placed on the item.
